posts.content: Can anyone tell me the paint code for a sperrwolf lock please ?

No... but I had the same dilemma when I wanted to paint my WASO CSL.
In the end I decided I would never know and wanted it to look the same as my Change Speed Lever so it got painted to match..
For my September 1964 65 MY VW that was L466 silver beige?
Not exterior top colour which is L289 blue white.

I would look on thesamba.com for Sperrwolf paint code .... a nerd on there will know..!
These Sperrwolf locks were made for various VW items.
Because I found.... I now have bought two WASO CSL locks and two WASO column locks.

Several samba posters commented on painting their locks to match as I did.
There are beetle ghia and bus threads ...when I wss seeking WASO bits n keys I read all.. got a key too....

start here...

https://www.thesamba.com/vw/forum/viewt ... 5&start=40

see you in a year... LOL

Thank you G.
i was already aware that a guy on samba was selling it but it is $35 plus postage from Argentina.
So was hoping for a code so a could get my local place to can some up for me.
love that sperrwolf key ring...may ask Aunty to make one/some.
